name: Dial Spiral
description:
Web player works, but EXE is the preferred play method.

After being chased through the forest, you have finally found sanctuary in a old ranger station tower. You wont be safe for long though. Your only hope is on the other end of a radio for a helicopter to come save you. Listen to the instructions and hope they can find you in time before it's to late...

Made for the AIE Spring 2020 Game Jam!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left click - Interact/move dial left

Right click - Move dial right

Credits: Designers:
